title: Senior Underwriter at Accenture (Charlotte, NC)
text: Source: PharmaDiversityJobBoard.com Organization: Business Process Outsourcing Location: Charlotte, NC This is your invitation to join an organization offering greater opportunity, greater challenge and greater satisfaction. Accenture Credit Services BPO is a dedicated team of people who provide end-to-end mortgage processing capabilities to our clients through long-term partnerships. We not only maintain this key business function for our clients, we constantly seek to improve them to help our clients move ahead of the competition. Accenture Credit Services is one of the top three providers of mortgage processing services in the US. As part of our Accenture Credit Services team, you can expect to: * Receive ongoing training to build and extend professional, technical and management skills * Work with highly talented people in a creative and collaborative environment * Learn from our supportive, approachable leaders who are the best in the business * Incorporate skills to deliver high quality solutions for our clients * Enjoy a defined career path that recognizes Top Performers * Receive a competitive Accenture Total Rewards benefits package - including paid overtime for our Underwriting Professionals! A Senior Underwriter is responsible for timely reviews of loan files in order to render acceptable Conforming Product credit decisions (approve, deny, counter offer). The complete file review includes applying analytical - guideline driven skills to determine: credit worthiness, compute Income calculations to determine ability to repay, establish acceptable benefit to the borrower, assess asset statements to determine and meet liquidity requirements, determine collateral acceptability, along with interpreting and determining acceptability of other supporting documents (HOI, MI, Title, Compliance, etc). This includes the interim condition review requirements as gathered in order to meet file completeness. File completeness includes adequate and effective written and verbal communication describing the decision reached in a manner that will maintain a positive relationship with all customers. The Senior Underwriter is required to maintain both production and quality to acceptable standards. The Senior Underwriter is required to provide exemplary customer service to both internal and external customers by explaining credit decisions and offering alternative options when needed. This includes prompt, courteous, and excellent service in accordance to company standards. The Senior Underwriter is expected to cooperate and interact with all entities of the client in a positive professional manner. The Senior Underwriter may be called upon to perform other job related duties and special projects as required. Basic Qualifications: * Minimum 3yrs experience in manually underwriting property and credit with lender approved, full package signoff authority greater than $500,000. Minimum 1yr experience signing on non-conforming loans High school diploma Professional Skill Requirements: * Experience with and knowledge of property and credit underwriting requirements of FNMA, FHLMC, and private mortgage insurance companies * Ability to effectively make decisions in an independent manner and availability as a resource advisor for all staff * Good analytical, problem solving, organizational and communication skills needed * Excellent oral and written communication skills are required * Computer skills: Microsoft Word, Outlook * Demonstrated leadership in professional setting; either military or civilian * Demonstrated teamwork and collaboration in a professional setting; either military or civilian Applicants for employment in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States and with Accenture (i.e., H1-B visa, F-1 visa (OPT), TN visa or any other non-immigrant status). Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration. Accenture is an EEO and Affirmative Action Employer of Females/Minorities/Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities. Equal Employment Opportunity All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state or local law. Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women. Job: Business Process Specialization Organization: Client Delivery & Operations Job Level: Non-supervisory
